title: 请问 起床插件TAB怎么设置
author: BymcLei
txt_content: 起床插件TAB怎么设置 起床绿队 起床红队之类的

replies.txt_content:
起床配置config中 teamname-on-tab: true
设置true

replies.author: BymcLei
replies.txt_content:
1273796085 发表于 2018-2-20 22:02
起床配置config中 teamname-on-tab: true
设置true
还有请问 没旁观模式怎么开

1911856809 发表于 2018-2-21 22:12
还有请问 没旁观模式怎么开
把起床配置发一下

replies.author: BymcLei
replies.txt_content:
1273796085 发表于 2018-2-23 18:43
把起床配置发一下
chat-prefix: "&b起床战争 &c?"
plugin-metrics: true
send-error-data: true
global-messages: true
global-autobalance: false
global-chat-after-end: true
gamelength: 60
allow-crafting: false
overwrite-names: false
lobby-gamemode: 2
holographic-stats:
  show-prefix: false
  name-color: '&7'
  value-color: '&3'
  head-line: "起床战争"
teamname-on-tab: true
teamname-in-chat: true
hearts-on-death: true
die-on-void: true
lobbytime: 80
lobby-chatformat: $player$ &6>> &f$msg$
ingame-chatformat-all: "&7[&f所有人&7]&7[$team$&7] $player$ &6>> &f$msg$"
ingame-chatformat: '&7[$team$&7] $player$ &6>> &f$msg$'
game-block: BED_BLOCK
store-game-records: true
store-game-records-holder: true
bed-sound: ENDERDRAGON_GROWL
player-drops: false
keep-inventory-on-death: false
place-in-liquid: true
breakable-blocks:
  use-as-blacklist: false
  list:
  - none
jointeam-entity:
  show-name: true
lobby-scoreboard:
  enabled: true
  title: "&c起床战争&6&l"
  content:
  - ''
  - "&e地图&7: &a$gamename$"
  - "&e人数&7: &a$players$/$maxplayers$"
  - ' '
  - "&6请等待游戏开始 ..."
  - ''
  - "&b红飞制作:"
  - "&a感谢您的使用"
scoreboard:
  format-bed-destroyed: '&c$status$ $team$'
  format-bed-alive: '&a$status$ $team$'
  format-title: "&c起床战争&f - $time$"
titles:
  win:
    enabled: true
    title-fade-in: 1.5
    title-stay: 5.0
    title-fade-out: 2.0
    subtitle-fade-in: 1.5
    subtitle-stay: 5.0
    subtitle-fade-out: 2.0
  map:
    enabled: false
    title-fade-in: 1.5
    title-stay: 2.0
    title-fade-out: 1.5
    subtitle-fade-in: 1.5
    subtitle-stay: 2.0
    subtitle-fade-out: 1.5
  countdown:
    enabled: true
    format: '&3{countdown}'
explodes:
  destroy-worldblocks: false
  destroy-beds: false
  drop-blocking: false
friendlyfire: false
friendlybreak: false
gameoverdelay: 8
use-internal-shop: true
save-inventory: true
show-team-in-actionbar: false
chat-to-all-prefix:
- '!'
- '#'
seperate-game-chat: true
seperate-spectator-chat: false
statistics:
  enabled: true
  show-on-game-end: true
  storage: sql
  bed-destroyed-kills: false
  scores:
    kill: 2
    die: 0
    win: 30
    bed-destroy: 5
    lose: 0
    record: 10
  player-leave-kills: false
database:
  host: 127.0.0.1
  port: 3306
  db: bw
  user: root
  password: 2333
  connection-pooling:
    min-pool-size: 3
    max-pool-size: 50
spectation-enabled: false
respawn-protection: 3
allowed-commands:
- /help
endgame:
  mainlobby-enabled: false
  all-players-to-mainlobby: false
bungeecord:
  enabled: false
  hubserver: hub
  endgame-in-lobby: false
  full-restart: false
  spigot-restart: false
  motds:
    lobby: |
      $regionname$
      &7[&b$currentplayers$&7/&b$maxplayers$&7]
    running: |
      $regionname$
      &7[&b$currentplayers$&7/&b$maxplayers$&7]
    stopped: |
      $regionname$
      &c[Stopped]
    full: |
      $regionname$
      &7[&b$currentplayers$&7/&b$maxplayers$&7]
locale: zh
ressource:
  bronze:
    item: CLAY_BRICK
    spawn-interval: 150
    amount: 1
    spread: 1.0
    name: "&4铜"
  iron:
    item: IRON_INGOT
    spawn-interval: 600
    amount: 1
    spread: 1.0
    name: "&7铁"
  gold:
    item: GOLD_INGOT
    spawn-interval: 1500
    amount: 1
    spread: 1.0
    name: "&6金"
check-updates: false
update-infos: false
rewards:
  enabled: true
  player-win:
  - /gokistats points add {player} 2
  player-end-game:
  - /example {player} 10
  player-destroy-bed:
  - /gokistats points add {player} 1
  player-kill:
  - /example {player} 10
specials:
  rescue-platform:
    break-time: 10
    using-wait-time: 20
    item: BLAZE_ROD
    can-break: true
    block: SLIME_BLOCK
  protection-wall:
    break-time: 0
    wait-time: 20
    can-break: true
    item: BRICK
    block: SANDSTONE
    width: 5
    height: 3
    distance: 2
  magnetshoe:
    probability: 75
    boots: IRON_BOOTS
  warp-powder:
    show-particles: true
    particle: fireworksSpark
    teleport-time: 4
  trap:
    play-sound: true
    effects:
    - ==: PotionEffect
      effect: 15
      duration: 100
      amplifier: 2
      ambient: true
      has-particles: true
    - ==: PotionEffect
      effect: 18
      duration: 100
      amplifier: 2
      ambient: true
      has-particles: true
    - ==: PotionEffect
      effect: 2
      duration: 100
      amplifier: 2
      ambient: true
      has-particles: true
  tntsheep:
    fuse-time: 8.0
    speed: 0.4
    explosion-factor: 1.0
  arrow-blocker:
    protection-time: 10
    using-wait-time: 30
    item: ender_eye
sign:
  first-line: $title$
  second-line: "地图 $gamename$"
  third-line: "玩家 &7[&b$currentplayers$&7/&b$maxplayers$&7]"
  fourth-line: "状态 $status$"
player-settings:
  one-stack-on-shift: true
  old-shop-as-default: false
lobbytime-full: 30
hearts-in-halfs: true
command-prefix: bw
lobbycountdown-rule: 2
overwrite-display-names: true
